thread.section_title: Amarante Champs-Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Classy, cozy and close to the action!
thread.title_full: Classy, cozy and close to the action! - Review of Amarante Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TACustomer
title: Classy, cozy and close to the action!
text:
I visited this hotel last week for one night on a business trip. From the Gare de Lyon railway station, it was very easy and fast to travel to the George V Metro station. Emerging from the south side of the Ave. de Champs-Elysees, the hotel was only 50 metres away on a side street.
Very warm welcome by English-speaking reception staff, small (20 m2) but very nicely furnished room, comfortable wide bed, nice bathroom. Breakfast was normal for this class of hotel.
Very well-located for Paris tourists and business visitors. I would come back here!
Room Tip: I had no problems with a room on the busy side street. Little traffic noise. See more room tips
